rooms.name: entrance hall
rooms.description: A spacious entrance area designed according to Vastu principles with east-facing entry. It includes a foyer leading to living spaces and connects directly to the outdoor swimming pool area via an adjacent covered walkway.

rooms.name: living room
rooms.description: A colonial-style living room featuring high ceilings, exposed beams, and ample natural light from south-facing windows in line with Vastu guidelines. The room is designed for comfort and social gatherings.

rooms.name: kitchen
rooms.description: An open-plan kitchen that adheres to modern colonial aesthetics while respecting traditional Indian cooking practices. It is placed away from the main living area, but conveniently connected through a corridor.

rooms.name: dining area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the kitchen, providing an elegant dining space with subtle colonial details and ample seating. The dining area faces west as recommended by Vastu for energy balance.

rooms.name: studio apartment
rooms.description: A versatile multi-purpose room that serves as a bedroom and workspace, designed with sufficient natural light from north-facing windows following Vastu principles to enhance mental clarity.

rooms.name: bathroom
rooms.description: A well-ventilated bathroom integrated with natural lighting and placed in the northwest sector of the ground floor per Vastu norms for personal hygiene. It includes a compact space optimized for functionality.

openings.name: main entrance
openings.description: South-facing main entrance that allows optimal energy flow according to Vastu principles.

openings.name: balcony
openings.description: East-facing balcony providing a relaxing view of the outdoor swimming pool and aligning with positive energy flows.

openings.name: swimming pool access
openings.description: A dedicated opening for the swimming pool area, strategically placed to maintain privacy while ensuring ease of access.
